---
title: Excitatory amino acid transporter 2 (EAAT2)
---


- a specific glutamate transporter protein @osullivanPhysicalRehabilitation2019


# Deficiency 
- A deficiency in EAAT2 is correlated with excitoxicity and neurodegeneration @osullivanPhysicalRehabilitation2019
    - This has been attributed as a factor that impacts [ALS]({{< var ref-amyotrophic-lateral-sclerosis.path >}}) progression @osullivanPhysicalRehabilitation2019
